note:
Raison d'etre: Citizen journalist and history anarchist. Fuck TV / corporate journalism - the machinery of fascism.

Until workers of world, unite - world-strike as one, together - solidarity of all race: Then all we are is slaves to fasci corporatism - the machine.

'Above all, always be capable of feeling deeply any injustice committed against anyone, anywhere in the world. This is the most beautiful quality in a revolutionary.'
